attributes.action: change the law so that all food must be marked as vegetarian, vegan or non-vegetarian.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The law should be changed so that companies must mark whether or not a product is suitable for vegetarians/vegans or not (so people need not be concerned about unmarked ingredients in products and have to manually check that there are no ingredients that they cannot have in the product.)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
